info.title: Etsy OpenAPI
info.description:
Etsy's Open API provides a simple RESTful interface for various Etsy.com features. The API reference documents endpoints are meant to replace Etsy's current Open API this year. Use of the API is subject to the API Terms of Use.

If you would like to make requests to the Open API v3 endpoints, please fill out the intake form.

The API is currently in an experimental, alpha phase meant to validate feature and functionality requirements. During this phase, endpoints may have significant design changes but developers will have an opportunity to preview endpoints and provide feedback that will help shape Etsy's Open API functionality. The alpha API design is not stable and will likely change in response to feedback but we'll communicate changes as they are made.

All of the endpoints are callable, but many endpoints are currently interface stubs and will return a "501 Not Implemented" response code when called; the documentation for each of these stub endpoints includes an alert calling this out.

If you'd like to report an issue or provide feedback on the API design, please add an issue in Github. You grant us a license to use your feedback as described in Etsy's primary Terms of Use.

© 2021 Etsy, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Use of this code is subject to Etsy's API Developer Terms of Use.

post.description:
AlphaGive feedback

This endpoint is ready for use as defined below, but is access-controlled and may change significantly before launch. If you'd like access, please email developers@etsy.com.

Creates a [listing](/openapi/developers#tag/ShopListing) of a product for sale in a shop.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

schema.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

quantity.description: The positive non-zero number of products available for purchase in the listing. Note: The listing quantity is the sum of available offering quantities. You can request the quantities for individual offerings from the ListingInventory resource using the [getListingInventory](/openapi/developeres#operation/getListingInventory) endpoint.

title.description: The listing's title string. Valid title strings contain only letters, numbers, punctuation marks, mathematical symbols, whitespace characters, ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{P}\p{Sm}\p{Zs}™©®]/u) You can only use the %, :, & and + characters once each.

description.description: A description string of the product for sale in the listing.

price.description: The positive non-zero price of the product. (Sold product listings are private) Note: The price is the minimum possible price. The getInventory method requests exact prices for available offerings.

who_made.description: An enumerated string inidcated who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading.

when_made.description: An enumerated string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading.

taxonomy_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop.  [See SellerTaxonomy](/openapi/developers#tag/SellerTaxonomy) for more information.

type.description: An enumerated type string that indicates whether the listing is physical or a digital download.

materials.description: A list of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the [shipping profile](/openapi/developeres#tag/ShopListing-ShippingProfile) associated with the listing. Default value is null.

shop_section_id.description: The numeric ID of the [shop section](/openapi/developeres#tag/Shop-Section) for this listing. Default value is null.

processing_min.description: The minimum number of days required to process this listing. Default value is null.

processing_max.description: The maximum number of days required to process this listing. Default value is null.

tags.description: A list of tag strings for the listing. Valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}\-'™©®]/u) Default value is null.

recipient.description: An enumerated string indicating a person for whom this product would make an appropriate gift. Default value is null.

occasion.description: An enumerated string indicating an occassion for which this product would make an appropriate gift. Default value is null.

styles.description: An array of style strings for this listing, each of which is free-form text string such as "Formal", or "Steampunk". A Listing may have up to two styles. Valid style strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

item_weight.description: The numeric weight of the product measured in units set in 'item_weight_unit'. Default value is null.

item_length.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in 'item_dimensions_unit'. Default value is null.

item_width.description: The numeric width of the product measured in units set in 'item_dimensions_unit'. Default value is null.

item_height.description: The numeric height of the product measured in units set in 'item_dimensions_unit'. Default value is null.

item_weight_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the weight of the product. Default value is null.

item_dimensions_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the dimensions of the product. Default value is null.

is_personalizable.description: When true, this listing is personalizable. The default value is null.

image_ids.description: An array of numeric image IDs of the images in a listing, which can include up to 10 images.

state.description: An enumerated string from any of: active, removed, sold_out, expired, alchemy, edit, create, private, or unavailable.

channels.description: An array of enumerated channel ID strings. A channel is a venue for sellers to reach buyers in order to make sales.

is_supply.description: When true, tags the listing as a supply product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Supplies heading.

is_customizable.description: When true, a buyer may contact the seller for a customized order. The default value is true when a shop accepts custom orders. Does not apply to shops that do not accept custom orders.

is_taxable.description: When true, applicable [shop](/openapi/developeres#tag/Shop) tax rates apply to this listing at checkout.

is_private.description: When true, this is a private listing intendend for a specific buyer and hidden from shop view.

should_auto_renew.description: When true, renews a listing for four months upon expriation. If set to true when previously false, etsy.com renews the listing before it expires, but the renewal period starts immidiately rather than extending the listing's expiration date. Any unused time remaining on the listing is lost. Renewals result in charges to a user's bill.

Open API V3 endpoint to delete a ShopListing. A ShopListing can be deleted only if the state is one of the following: SOLD_OUT, DRAFT, EXPIRED, INACTIVE, ACTIVE and is_available or ACTIVE and has seller flags: SUPRESSED (frozen), VACATION, CUSTOM_SHOPS (pattern), SELL_ON_FACEBOOK

post.description:
Feedback only Give feedback

Development for this endpoint is in progress. It will only return a 501 response.

Upload a new ListingFile, or attach an existing file to the given ShopListing. You must either provide the listing_file_id of an existing ListingFile, or the name and file data of a new ListingFile that you are uploading. If you are attaching a ListingFile to a physical ShopListing, the ShopListing will be converted to a digital ShopListing. This will cause the ShopListing to have free shipping and will remove any variations.

Update the inventory for a listing. The update will fail if the supplied values for product sku and offering quantity and price are incompatible with the supplied values of the 'on_property_*' fields. When supplying a price, supply a float equivalent to amount divided by divisor as specified in the Money resource.

Updates a ShopListing.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

schema.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The unique numeric ID for a listing in a specific [shop](/openapi/developeres#tag/Shop).

schema.description: The unique numeric ID for a listing in a specific [shop](/openapi/developeres#tag/Shop).

quantity.description: The positive non-zero number of products available for purchase in the listing. Note: The listing quantity is the sum of available offering quantities. You can request the quantities for individual offerings from the ListingInventory resource using the [getListingInventory](/openapi/developeres#operation/getListingInventory) endpoint.

price.description: The positive non-zero price of the product. (Sold product listings are private) Note: The price is the minimum possible price. The getInventory method requests exact prices for available offerings.

title.description: The listing's title string. Valid title strings contain only letters, numbers, punctuation marks, mathematical symbols, whitespace characters, ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{P}\p{Sm}\p{Zs}™©®]/u) You can only use the %, :, & and + characters once each.

description.description: A description string of the product for sale in the listing.

materials.description: A list of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

should_auto_renew.description: When true, renews a listing for four months upon expriation. If set to true when previously false, etsy.com renews the listing before it expires, but the renewal period starts immidiately rather than extending the listing's expiration date. Any unused time remaining on the listing is lost. Renewals result in charges to a user's bill.

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the [shipping profile](/openapi/developeres#tag/ShopListing-ShippingProfile) associated with the listing. Default value is null.

shop_section_id.description: The numeric ID of the [shop section](/openapi/developeres#tag/Shop-Section) for this listing. Default value is null.

item_weight.description: The numeric weight of the product measured in units set in 'item_weight_unit'. Default value is null.

item_length.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in 'item_dimensions_unit'. Default value is null.

item_width.description: The numeric width of the product measured in units set in 'item_dimensions_unit'. Default value is null.

item_height.description: The numeric height of the product measured in units set in 'item_dimensions_unit'. Default value is null.

item_weight_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the weight of the product. Default value is null.

item_dimensions_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the dimensions of the product. Default value is null.

is_taxable.description: When true, applicable [shop](/openapi/developeres#tag/Shop) tax rates apply to this listing at checkout.

taxonomy_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop.  [See SellerTaxonomy](/openapi/developers#tag/SellerTaxonomy) for more information.

tags.description: A list of tag strings for the listing. Valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}\-'™©®]/u) Default value is null.

who_made.description: An enumerated string inidcated who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading.

when_made.description: An enumerated string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading.

featured_rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the featured listings of the shop, with rank 1 listings appearing in the left-most position in featured listing on a shop’s home page.

is_personalizable.description: When true, this listing is personalizable. The default value is null.

is_private.description: When true, this is a private listing intendend for a specific buyer and hidden from shop view.

publish.description: When true, etsy.com publishes the listing. False does not publish the listing.

type.description: An enumerated type string that indicates whether the listing is physical or a digital download.

state.description: An enumerated string from any of: active, removed, sold_out, expired, alchemy, edit, create, private, or unavailable.

channels.description: An array of enumerated channel ID strings. A channel is a venue for sellers to reach buyers in order to make sales.

Creates variation images on a listing.\n\nvariation_images is an array with inputs for the property_id, value_id, and image_id fields. image_ids are associated with a ListingImage on the Listing associated with the provided listing_id. property_id and value_id pairs are associated with a ListingProduct on the Listing associated with the provided listing_id. variation_images does not contain any duplicates. variation_images does not contain more than one property_id as variation images can only be associated on one property. The update overwrites all existing variation images on a listing, so if your request is successful, the variation images on the listing will be exactly those you specify.

api_key.name: x-api-key
api_key.description: Every request to a v3 API endpoint must include this data, with your application's API key as the value.

oauth2.description: The v3 API supports authenticating via OAuth 2.0. More information about Etsy's specific implementation of OAuth2 can be found [here](/developers/documentation/getting_started/oauth2).

ShopListing.description: A listing from a shop, which contains a product quantity, title, description, price, etc.

listing_id.description: The unique numeric ID for a listing in a specific [shop](/openapi/developeres#tag/Shop).

user_id.description: The numeric ID for the user posting the listing.

shop_id.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

title.description: The listing's title string. Valid title strings contain only letters, numbers, punctuation marks, mathematical symbols, whitespace characters, ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{P}\\p{Sm}\\p{Zs}™©®]/u) You can only use the %, :, & and + characters once each.

description.description: A description string of the product for sale in the listing.

state.description: An enumerated string from any of: active, removed, sold_out, expired, alchemy, edit, create, private, or unavailable.

creation_timestamp.description: The listing\'s creation time, in epoch seconds.

ending_timestamp.description: The listing\'s expiration time, in epoch seconds.

original_creation_timestamp.description: The listing\'s creation time, in epoch seconds.

last_modified_timestamp.description: The time of the last update to the listing, in epoch seconds.

state_timestamp.description: The date and time of the last state change of this listing.

quantity.description: The positive non-zero number of products available for purchase in the listing. Note: The listing quantity is the sum of available offering quantities. You can request the quantities for individual offerings from the ListingInventory resource using the [getListingInventory](/openapi/developeres#operation/getListingInventory) endpoint.

shop_section_id.description: The unique ID of an Etsy Shop Section.

featured_rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the featured listings of the shop, with rank 1 listings appearing in the left-most position in featured listing on a shop’s home page.

url.description: The full URL to the listing's page on Etsy.

views.description: The number of times users viewed this listing on Etsy.com (does not include API views).

num_favorers.description: The number of users who marked this Listing a favorite.

non_taxable.description: When true, applicable [shop](/openapi/developeres#tag/Shop) tax rates do not apply to this listing at checkout.

is_customizable.description: When true, a buyer may contact the seller for a customized order. The default value is true when a shop accepts custom orders. Does not apply to shops that do not accept custom orders.

listing_type.description: An enumerated type string that indicates whether the listing is physical or a digital download.

tags.description: A list of tag strings for the listing. Valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}\\-'™©®]/u) Default value is null.

materials.description: A list of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

shipping_template_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping template associated with the listing.

processing_min.description: The minimum number of days required to process this listing. Default value is null.

processing_max.description: The maximum number of days required to process this listing. Default value is null.

style.description: An array of style strings for this listing, each of which is free-form text string such as \"Formal\", or \"Steampunk\". A Listing may have up to two styles. Valid style strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

file_data.description: A string describing the files attached to a digital listing.

has_variations.description: When true, the listing has variations.

should_auto_renew.description: When true, renews a listing for four months upon expriation. If set to true when previously false, etsy.com renews the listing before it expires, but the renewal period starts immidiately rather than extending the listing's expiration date. Any unused time remaining on the listing is lost. Renewals result in charges to a user's bill.
